en_sentence: Please set the table before dinner.
zh_sentence: 請在晚餐前擺好桌子。

en_sentence: Be careful
zh_sentence: the dog might bite.
column5: 小心，那隻狗可能會咬人。

en_sentence: The flowers will die without water.
zh_sentence: 花若沒水就會枯死。

en_sentence: I left my book somewhere in the classroom.
zh_sentence: 我把書放在教室的某處。

en_sentence: She studies abroad next year.
zh_sentence: 她明年到國外念書。

en_sentence: Sit beside me on the bench.
zh_sentence: 坐在長椅的我的旁邊。

en_sentence: The teacher gave an example to explain the rule.
zh_sentence: 老師給了一個例子來解釋這個規則。

en_sentence: Reading books helps you gain knowledge.
zh_sentence: 閱讀書籍幫助你獲得知識。

en_sentence: It does not matter if you are late once.
zh_sentence: 偶爾遲到一次並不重要。

en_sentence: Excuse me for being late to class.
zh_sentence: 對不起，我上課遲到了。

en_sentence: He performed a magic trick with cards.
zh_sentence: 他用牌表演了一個魔術。

en_sentence: Earth is our home planet.
zh_sentence: 地球是我們的家園星球。

en_sentence: The scouts set up base near the lake.
zh_sentence: 童子軍在湖邊建立了基地。

en_sentence: The typhoon will reach us tomorrow.
zh_sentence: 颱風明天會到達我們這裡。

en_sentence: This bag of rice weighs one kilogram.
zh_sentence: 這袋米重一公斤。

en_sentence: He lifted a ten-pound weight at the gym.
zh_sentence: 他在健身房舉起了十磅重物。

en_sentence: One hundred grams of sugar is in the recipe.
zh_sentence: 食譜中需要一百公克的糖。

en_sentence: Turn to page twenty in your workbook.
zh_sentence: 翻到你的作業本第二十頁。

en_sentence: She bought a dozen eggs at the market.
zh_sentence: 她在市場買了一打雞蛋。

en_sentence: The candy costs fifty cents.
zh_sentence: 這顆糖果要價五十分錢。

en_sentence: The businessman traveled abroad for a meeting.
zh_sentence: 那位商人出國開會。

en_sentence: The salesman showed us the new product.
zh_sentence: 業務員向我們展示了新產品。

en_sentence: The shopkeeper greeted every customer with a smile.
zh_sentence: 店主向每位顧客微笑打招呼。

en_sentence: She wants to become a lawyer when she grows up.
zh_sentence: 她長大後想成為律師。

en_sentence: I have an appointment with the dentist tomorrow.
zh_sentence: 我明天有牙醫預約。

en_sentence: Don't touch the hot pan
zh_sentence: it's too hot.
column5: 不要觸摸那個熱鍋，非常燙。

en_sentence: I have a headache after studying all afternoon.
zh_sentence: 下午一直念書之後我頭痛。

en_sentence: The crowd will cheer for the winning team.
zh_sentence: 人群會為獲勝的隊伍歡呼。

en_sentence: The leader guided the group up the mountain.
zh_sentence: 領導者帶領小組爬上山。

en_sentence: The class leader hands out the worksheets.
zh_sentence: 班長發放工作紙。

en_sentence: Are you ready for the test?
zh_sentence: 你準備好考試了嗎？

en_sentence: Every student needs to bring a notebook.
zh_sentence: 每位學生都需要帶筆記本。

en_sentence: The farmer uses a trap to kill weeds.
zh_sentence: 農夫用陷阱除草。

en_sentence: They barbecue chicken in the backyard on weekends.
zh_sentence: 他們週末在後院烤雞。

en_sentence: Walk on the sidewalk
zh_sentence: not in the street.
column5: 在人行道上走，不要在人行道外走。

en_sentence: Stand in the middle of the stage when you speak.
zh_sentence: 講話時要站在舞臺中間。

en_sentence: Look at the bottom of the book for the index.
zh_sentence: 看書底部的索引。

en_sentence: We saw a shark in the aquarium tank.
zh_sentence: 我們在水族館水槽裡看到鯊魚。

en_sentence: The battery is low
zh_sentence: so please charge your tablet.
column5: 電池電量低，請為你的平板充電。

en_sentence: The flowers are dead because you forgot to water them.
zh_sentence: 你忘了澆水，花都枯死了。

en_sentence: He has a slim chance of winning the lottery.
zh_sentence: 他中獎的機會很渺茫。

en_sentence: The book has a thick cover to protect the pages.
zh_sentence: 這本書有一個厚的書皮來保護頁面。

en_sentence: Be careful not to burn your hand on the stove.
zh_sentence: 小心別把手燙傷在爐子上。

en_sentence: Please tie your shoe laces before you run.
zh_sentence: 跑步前請先把鞋帶繫好。

en_sentence: He will deal with the problem after class.
zh_sentence: 他會在下課後處理這個問題。

en_sentence: Give me one piece of paper
zh_sentence: please.

en_sentence: Jump into the water
zh_sentence: it's fun to swim!

en_sentence: I research information on the Internet for my report.
zh_sentence: 我在網際網路上查資料做報告。

en_sentence: She has an interview for a summer job tomorrow.
zh_sentence: 她明天有一個暑期工作的面試。
